DOC.brief_summary: A Multi-Center , Double-Blind , Randomized , Placebo Controlled , Parallel-Group Study
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Therapeutic Equivalence Safety Azelaic Acid 15 % Topical Gel
DOC.detailed_description: A Multi-Center , Double-Blind , Randomized , Placebo Controlled , Parallel-Group Study , compare AZELAIC ACID TOPICAL GEL 15 % TO FINACEA® active treatment Placebo Control treatment Moderate Facial Rosacea .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male nonpregnant female ≥ 18 yearsofage clinical diagnosis moderate facial rosacea ; Subjects definite clinical diagnosis facial rosacea severity Grade 3 per IGE Female subject pregnant , nursing , plan become pregnant study participation ;
